ABOUT.TITLE: Howdy!
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH1: I'm Gabriele, a passionate computer science undergraduate from Italy
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH2: I've always been up for a challenge and that's why I love coding so much!
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH3: It keeps me engaged all the while making something that everybody will make use of.
ABOUT.PARAGRAPH4: As future full-stack developer, I am dedicated to mastering both front-end and back-end to bring users a fun and pleasant experience

PROJECT.HEADING: My list of projects

PROJECT.HEADING-DESC2: As time goes by this list is going to grow like an archive of sorts.
PROJECT.HEADING-DESC3: Not only that, each is entry is going to be better thant the last.
PROJECT.HEADING-DESC4: A testament to my skill as a developer
